title: Rethinking The Law of Attraction
description: Getting what you want may be easier than you think. It might only take some rethinking!In Rethinking The Law of Attraction, P.R. Young reveals the core concept of how to get what you want in life more often. From decades of research and experience, Young presents the ancient Law of Attraction in a new and more easily understood historical perspective, sans the mystery and hype.Young makes clear how this practical law has existed, been understood, and applied throughout time, making the use of this Law more available for you in your life today. In fact, Young's insights have been a driving force for helping her to become a more conscious creator of her own life. And now, through her latest book, which is itself an example of the law it presents, you can too!
author: Pam  Young
